translations: 水螅虫的；水螅类的；水螅体的；息肉状的

sentences.sentence: A lavender-colored nudibranch feeds on hydroids near Vatu-i-Ra, Fiji. Related to sea slugs, nudibranchs are shell-less mollusks that display some of the most vibrant colors found anywhere in nature.
sentences.translation: 薰衣草颜色的裸鳃以斐济Vatu-i-Ra附近的水螅虫作为饲料，与海蛞蝓有关的裸鳃是一种无壳的软体动物，可显示自然界里随处可见的一些最鲜明的色彩。
